categories: Category:The Star Wars Sourcebook narrative fiction

nodes.text: Ortugg's Letter Home is a short narrative story published in The Star Wars Sourcebook in 1987. It recounts Ortugg's letter home to Venorra about his time working for Jabba the Hutt.
The Star Wars Sourcebook spells Ortugg's name correctly within the letter, but "Orrtug" in its title.
